H3.text: where did the race in grease take place. Thunder Road

A4.text: Kenickie arrives in 'Greased Lightnin'', a heavily used car he plans on restoring to drag race it at Thunder Road.

A5.text: The race was filmed at the Los Angeles River, between the First and Seventh Street Bridges, where many other films have been shot.
